alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 02 at 9:25AM CST until February 06 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River NEAR White Oak Park For the Calcasieu River...including White Oak Park...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 930 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River NEAR White Oak Park. * WHEN...From this morning to late Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 2.0 feet, Minor flooding of Goos Ferry Road will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:35 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 2.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 2.3 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 2.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Calcasieu River White Oak Park 2.0 2.0 Wed 8 am CST 2.0 2.0 2.1 &&
